title: Faculty; classification schedule
context: [ยง304A-1002] Faculty; classification schedule. The board of regents shall classify all members of the faculty of the university including research workers, extension agents, and all personnel engaged in instructional work as referenced in section 76-16, and adopt a classification schedule and compensation plan for these employees. Annual increases of compensation shall be allowable for efficient service, and the board of regents shall adopt a fair and reasonable plan for rating the efficiency of individual employees affected by this section.
